summary: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.
cast: Randy Norton|Cynthia Leake|Steve Sandor|Sean Hannon|Leo Gordon|William Ostrander|Eileen O'Neill|Elizabeth Lloyd Shaw|Micky Morton|Tamarah Park|Big Yank|Greg Wayne Elam|Jimmy Bridges|Shane Callan|Archie Hamilton|Michael Kelloff|Douglas Payton|Dale Park|Susan Tyrrell|Maggie Roswell|Stephen Mendel|Alan Koss|Clare Torao|Hans Howes|Ray Oliver|Nathan Purdee|Le Tari|Candy Candido|Holly Frazetta|Emma Samms
title: Tygra: Hielo y fuego
